definitions.definition: to not give enough care or attention to people or things that are your responsibility:
to not do something, often because you forget:
examples: I'd neglected to give him the name of the hotel where I'd be staying.

definitions.definition: a situation in which you do not give enough care or attention to someone or something, or the state of not receiving enough care or attention:
examples: Both parents were found guilty of neglect and their child was taken away from them.
